Name: X-ACTOÂ® #8R Lightweight Utility Blades
Desciption: The #8 lightweight utility blade from X-ACTO is a general purpose blade designed to provide an accurate cut through a variety of different medium density materials, including cardboard, plastic, most papers, foam board, twine and more. The #8 blade also features a dual cutting edge, so when one side begins to dull, simply reverse the blade for a fresh cutting edge and get twice the blade for the price of one!
